contentrichtext.text: '''Qeqertarsuaq''' is an island in [[Qaasuitsup]] municipality, near [[Upernavik]], in northwestern [[Greenland]]. [[Qeqertarsuaq]] (meaning "Large Island") is the name of several islands in Greenland. The island near Upernavik should not be confused with the much larger island [[Qeqertarsuaq]], better known as [[Disko Island]], or the smaller island [[Qeqertarsuaq (Herbert Island)]] near [[Qaanaaq]] ([[Thule]]). Qeqertarsuaq in Upernavik has an area of 269 km². The only settlement on the island is [[Upernavik Kujalleq]] (Søndre Upernavik). Qeqertarsuaq in Upernavik is also known as ''Qeqertaq'', meaning just "Island". [[Qeqertaq Island]] is also the name of another island near Upernavik (Danish: [[Skalø]]) and of a settlement in [[Qasigiannguit]]. {{coord|72|16|N|55|20|W|dim:50000_region:GL|display=title}} [[Category:Islands of Greenland]] {{Greenland-geo-stub}}
